Package com.pluralsight

Class Transactions

java.lang.Object
com.pluralsight.Transactions
public class Transactions extends Object
The Transactions class represents a financial transaction with attributes including description, vendor, date, time, amount, and transaction type (deposit or payment).

  • Constructor Details

    • Transactions

      public Transactions(String description, String vendor, LocalDate date, LocalTime time, double amount)
      Constructs a new Transactions object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      description - The description or item name for the transaction.
      vendor - The name of the vendor associated with the transaction.
      date - The date of the transaction in the form of LocalDate.
      time - The time of the transaction in the form of LocalTime.
      amount - The transaction amount in USD. A positive amount indicates a deposit, while a negative amount indicates a payment.
